about_the_game: Join Daniel and Calvin as they create drama and fight media personalities. This is a 3D fighting game with a fully-3D environment. This game has three modes: Story Mode and Extra Matches Mode. Story Mode puts the player on a journey to stop conflicts on social media with different influencers. The story mode levels each has one boss with an army of regular enemies to fight. The player must either defeat 60 of the regular enemies or defeat the boss to beat each level. These levels have large maps for exploration. The player can also find warp zones that transport them to hidden levels in these maps. Extra Matches Mode contains 1v1 matches. These 1v1 matches take place in small stages. Players have 4 attack options and can play as four characters. Each character has an adrenaline meter that fills up. The character can launch a special attack once the meter is filled up.
